alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:45PM CDT until March 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR LOWNDES COUNTY... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbus, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Columbus AFB around 750 PM CDT. Steens and Kolola Springs around 755 PM CDT. Caledonia around 800 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
